description.zh-cn: 明朝和清朝时期四川省顺庆府下辖的一个州，由元代的广安府降格而来。民国初年被改制为广安县。
description.en: A zhou (prefecture) under Shunqing Fu in Sichuan during the Ming and Qing dynasties. It was downgraded from the Yuan dynasty's Guang'an Fu and was reorganized into Guang'an County in the early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代。洪武四年（1371年）将广安府降为广安州，洪武十年（1377年）将渠江县并入广安州。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history. In the fourth year of the Hongwu reign (1371), it downgraded Guang'an Fu to Guang'an Zhou, and in the tenth year of Hongwu (1377), it merged Qujiang County into Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一种行政区划单位。
description.en: A type of administrative division in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，在此期间将宁西军改置为广安府。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, during which Ningxi Jun was reorganized into Guang'an Fu.

description.zh-cn: 元代的一个军事或行政单位，后被改置为广安府。
description.en: A military or administrative unit in the Yuan dynasty, which was later reorganized into Guang'an Fu.

description.zh-cn: 元代设立的一个行政区划，隶属于四川省顺庆路，后在明代被降格为广安州。
description.en: An administrative division established in the Yuan dynasty, subordinate to Shunqing Lu of Sichuan Province, and later downgraded to Guang'an Zhou in the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一个省级行政区。元代时，广安府隶属于其下的顺庆路。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region in China. During the Yuan dynasty, Guang'an Fu was subordinate to its Shunqing Lu.

description.zh-cn: 元代四川省的一个路级行政区划。
description.en: A lu-level administrative division in Sichuan Province during the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元代广安府的治所。明洪武十年（1377年）被并入广安州。
description.en: The seat of government for Guang'an Fu during the Yuan dynasty. It was merged into Guang'an Zhou in the tenth year of the Hongwu reign (1377).

description.zh-cn: 明、清时期的一个府级行政区划，广安州为其下辖州。
description.en: A fu-level administrative division during the Ming and Qing dynasties, which administered Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 明、清时期隶属于广安州的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明、清时期隶属于广安州的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明、清时期隶属于广安州的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明、清时期隶属于广安州的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的最后一个帝制王朝，沿袭了明朝对广安州的设置。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history, which continued the administrative setup of Guang'an Zhou from the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 民国初年推行的一项行政区划改革政策，旨在简化地方行政层级。该政策导致广安州被废除，改设为广安县。
description.en: An administrative reform policy implemented in the early years of the Republic of China aimed at simplifying local administrative levels. This policy led to the abolition of Guang'an Zhou and its replacement with Guang'an County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年由广安州改制而成的县。
description.en: A county established in the early years of the Republic of China through the reorganization of Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 元代改宁西军置广安府。
description.en: The Yuan dynasty reorganized Ningxi Jun to establish Guang'an Fu.

description.zh-cn: 广安府由宁西军改置而来。
description.en: Guang'an Fu was established through the reorganization of Ningxi Jun.

description.zh-cn: 元代广安府隶属于顺庆路。
description.en: During the Yuan dynasty, Guang'an Fu was subordinate to Shunqing Lu.

description.zh-cn: 元代顺庆路是四川省下辖的行政单位。
description.en: During the Yuan dynasty, Shunqing Lu was an administrative unit under Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 明朝洪武四年（1371年），将广安府降格为广安州。
description.en: In 1371 (the fourth year of the Hongwu reign), the Ming dynasty downgraded Guang'an Fu to Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 广安州由广安府于明洪武四年（1371年）降格而来。
description.en: Guang'an Zhou was formed by the downgrading of Guang'an Fu in 1371 (the fourth year of the Hongwu reign) of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 自明洪武四年（1371年）起，广安州归属顺庆府管辖。
description.en: Starting from 1371 (the fourth year of the Hongwu reign), Guang'an Zhou was under the jurisdiction of Shunqing Fu.

description.zh-cn: 明洪武十年（1377年）五月，将渠江县省入广安州，取消了渠江县的独立建制。
description.en: In May 1377 (the tenth year of the Hongwu reign), the Ming dynasty merged Qujiang County into Guang'an Zhou, abolishing its independent status.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期，岳池县为广安州下辖四县之一。
description.en: During the Ming and Qing dynasties, Yuechi County was one of the four counties under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期，渠县为广安州下辖四县之一。
description.en: During the Ming and Qing dynasties, Qu County was one of the four counties under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期，邻水县为广安州下辖四县之一。
description.en: During the Ming and Qing dynasties, Linshui County was one of the four counties under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 明清时期，大竹县为广安州下辖四县之一。
description.en: During the Ming and Qing dynasties, Dazhu County was one of the four counties under the jurisdiction of Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 清代沿袭明制，继续设置广安州。
description.en: The Qing dynasty followed the Ming system and continued the establishment of Guang'an Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 民国初年，因“废府州厅改县”政策，广安州被废除。
description.en: In the early years of the Republic of China, Guang'an Zhou was abolished due to the policy of 'abolishing Fu, Zhou, and Ting for counties'.

description.zh-cn: 民国初年，广安州被改制为广安县。
description.en: In the early years of the Republic of China, Guang'an Zhou was reorganized into Guang'an County.
